name: Tag Team Wrestling
overview: A wrestling game that is primarily focused on tag team teamwork. You can either play as a the good guys (face team) or the villains (heel team)! You are challenged to match the awesome skills of your opponents... to gain the Title in the World Super Championships of tag team wrestling. Teamwork and stamina are the keys, as you and your partner battle your way through the Title Matches on your quest for the Belt. Attack your opponents with Body Slams, Drop Kicks, Back breakers, Flying Head Butts. or even throwing them out of the ring! To win, it's a pin for a count of three. Nothing can match the super excitement as the crowd cheers over this mania on the mat. Prepare yourself for Tag Team Wrestling!
